events.title: Breakfast
events.description: Start your day with a nutritious breakfast while connecting with other attendees.

events.title: Keynote: AI Governance and Community Power
events.description: Dr. Santos will address how communities can shape AI governance structures to ensure these powerful technologies serve public interest rather than reinforce existing power dynamics.

events.title: Morning Break
events.description: Refresh with coffee, tea, and light snacks while networking with other attendees.

events.title: Workshop: Digital Storytelling for Change
events.description: Learn how to craft compelling digital narratives that center community experiences and mobilize for social change. This workshop will cover the basics of narrative structure, media creation, and distribution platforms.

events.title: Workshop: Community Data Collection & Analysis
events.description: This hands-on workshop will teach participants how to design and implement community-centered data collection projects. Learn practical approaches to gather, analyze, and visualize data that can inform community advocacy efforts.

events.title: Lunch Break
events.description: Enjoy a catered lunch and network with peers, speakers, and facilitators.

events.title: Panel: Emerging Technologies & Digital Rights
events.description: This panel examines how emerging technologies like AR/VR, blockchain, and advanced AI systems are reshaping our understanding of digital rights and necessitating new frameworks for technology governance.

events.title: Afternoon Break
events.description: Recharge with refreshments before the final sessions of the day.

events.title: Workshop: Building Digital Coalitions
events.description: Learn practical strategies for building and sustaining digital coalitions across diverse stakeholders. This workshop will cover best practices for online organizing, collaborative decision-making, and maintaining momentum in virtual spaces.

events.title: Workshop: Ethics of AI in Community Contexts
events.description: This workshop explores ethical frameworks for deploying AI systems in community contexts. Participants will work through case studies and develop guidelines for AI implementation that centers community values and needs.

events.title: Conference Dinner & Cultural Celebration
events.description: Join us for a special evening celebrating the intersection of technology, culture, and community. The event will feature performances from local artists and a keynote conversation between distinguished speakers exploring the role of cultural expression in reimagining technological futures.
